About Me: I am currently pursuing my PhD at the University at Buffalo. I perform biological research in Dr. Paul Cullen's Lab and am a teaching assistant during the Fall and Spring semester. I also am a scientific writer and write articles for Massive Science. Before pursing my PhD, I obtained a Bachelor's degree in Nursing and worked as a Registered Nurse for 5 years.

Hobbies: I am a nature lover, avid hiker/backpacker, and passionate about environmental conservation. In my free time I love to read about science and nature (or something by Stephen King).

Affiliations: AAAS member, WWF member
